title: Podcast 351: How to fall back in love with yourself & find your identity
description:
Sign up to Patreon to get access to bonus ad-free podcasts, exclusive downloads, live Q&As and more: https://www.patreon.com/drcarolineleaf


EPISODE DESCRIPTION: In this podcast I interview bestselling author, podcast host and holistic meditation and wellness teacher Kimberly Snyder about how to fall back in love with yourself, realize you are more than enough, and create the life you deserve.

Read the show blog here: https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/how-to-fall-back-in-love-with-yourself-find-your-identity

Get Kimberly's book here: https://mysolluna.com/youaremore/ 

Follow Kimberly on Instagram: @kimberly_snyder


EPISODE HIGHLIGHTS:

8:30 The power of finding yourself

9:20 Why you are more than you think you are

11:00 What enlightenment means

12:00 Love versus fear

17:00 What true confidence is

23:50 The importance of creating “gaps” in our life

34:10 Bridging the divide between who we know we are & our behavior

47:30, 50:20 What an abundant life looks like


Get my new book Cleaning up Your Mental Mess here: https://www.cleaningupyourmentalmess.com

Download my new and improved brain detox app here: https://neurocycle.app

Sign up to join my free text program and receive mental health care tips. Just text DRLEAF to

US: 1 (833) 285 3747

UK: +447908679035

Canada: 18336032953

Get a free Cleaning up Your Mental Mess workbook when you subscribe to my weekly email at drleaf.com!

-Public Goods: Receive $15 off your first Public Goods order with NO MINIMUM purchase. Just go to https://www.publicgoods.com/DRLEAF.
